data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Motamedinia, Behnam, Skevington, Jeffrey H., Kelso, Scott (2019): Revision of Claraeola (Diptera, Pipunculidae) in the Middle East based on morphology and DNA barcodes. ZooKeys 873: 85-111, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.873.36645, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.873.36645
